Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptide-Peptoid Hybrids with and without Membrane Disruption.
Literature.Author: Bonvin E, Personne H, Paschoud T, Reusser J, Gan BH, Luscher A, Köhler T, van Delden C, Reymond JL

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=1000 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:IC50=110±6 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli W3110(MIC=2µg/ml),Escherichia coli W3110(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli W3110(MIC=1µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=2µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=2µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=1-2µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCTC 418(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCTC 418(MIC=>32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCTC 418(MIC=1-2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus COL(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus COL(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus COL(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14 4.18(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ZEM1.A(MIC=2-4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ZEM9.A(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae Oxa-48(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia(MIC=2-4µg/ml),Burkholderia cenocepacia(MIC=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14 4.18(MIC=2µg/ml),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=69±2µM)
